other_tests.findings: Thick epidermis and abundant calcium deposition compared with initial biopsy findings before treatment with vitamin D3.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After treatment with vitamin D3, more abundant calcium deposition was observed without perforation or transepidermal elimination.

other_tests.findings: Electron-dense deposits between degenerated elastic fibers surrounded by normal collagen fibers before treatment. After treatment, electron-lucent areas suggested unusual mineralization.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Electron microscopy revealed changes from electron-dense deposits to electron-lucent areas associated with unusual mineralization after vitamin D3 treatment.
